title: Linux dir Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux dir command and its practical applications for managing directories and files. Learn various options to customize directory listings and effectively navigate the file system.

meta.title: Linux dir Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux dir command and its practical applications for managing directories and files. Learn various options to customize directory listings and effectively navigate the file system.
meta.keywords: Linux, dir command, directory listing, file management, navigation, utilities

verify.name: Verify the dir command
verify.hint: Make sure the dir command is listing the contents of the current directory correctly. The output should include directories like Desktop, Documents, Downloads, etc.

verify.name: Verify the dir command with options
verify.hint: Make sure the dir command with the -l option is displaying the long-format listing, which includes file permissions, ownership, size, and modification time.

verify.name: Verify directory management with dir
verify.hint: Make sure the dir command can create and remove directories as expected. The script will create a new directory, then remove it recursively.
